name: Art Apart (itch)
description:
Relax with a few jigsaw puzzles featuring famous artwork from 1925.

Made for the Gaming Like It's 1925 (Public Domain) Game Jam.

Thanks for stopping by!

-----------------------------------------

Artwork Used:  The Three Dancers by Pablo Picasso (#1),  Horsewoman by Rudolf Frentz (#2),  Les fleurs dédaignées by Hilda Rix Nicholas (#3),  Milarepa, the One Who Harkened by Nicholas Roerich (#4), House by The Railroad by Edward Hopper (#5)

Music Used:  Always by Irving Berlin (#1), Ukulele Lady by Gus Kahn & Richard Whiting (#2).  Looking for a Boy by George & Ira Gershwin (#3)

I used Godot for the programming, and Flat.io to arrange the music. 

Special thanks to Max, Molly, Archer, and Michael.
